3297.verse: وَلَـٰكِنَّآ|But We|76|84|11572$أَنشَأْنَا|[We] produced|119|135|12271$قُرُونًا|generations|97|113|12291$فَتَطَاوَلَ|and prolonged|113|129|13469$عَلَيْهِمُ|for them|76|92|602$ٱلْعُمُرُ‌ۚ|the life.|76|92|11802$وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$كُنتَ|you were|81|93|1281$ثَاوِيًا|a dweller|79|104|13470$فِىٓ|among|63|88|89$أَهْلِ|(the) people|102|127|2993$مَدْيَنَ|(of) Madyan,|106|131|6584$تَتْلُواْ|reciting|69|94|946$عَلَيْهِمْ|to them|76|88|22$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Verses,|97|148|1344$وَلَـٰكِنَّا|but We|76|178|11572$كُنَّا|[We] were|90|192|4361$مُرْسِلِينَ|the Senders.|105|156|13471$

3299.verse: وَلَوْلَآ|And if not|85|94|2238$أَن|[that]|60|78|655$تُصِيبَهُم|struck them|99|117|12695$مُّصِيبَةُۢ|a disaster|88|106|1372$بِمَا|for what|76|94|43$قَدَّمَتْ|had sent forth|115|133|897$أَيْدِيهِمْ|their hands|94|103|757$فَيَقُولُواْ|and they would say,|155|171|13067$رَبَّنَا|"Our Lord!|86|118|1167$لَوْلَآ|Why not|76|108|1090$أَرْسَلْتَ|You sent|90|122|11703$إِلَيْنَا|to us|57|89|1234$رَسُولاً|a Messenger|103|119|1181$فَنَتَّبِعَ|so we (could have) followed|207|236|11704$ءَايَـٰتِكَ|Your Verses|99|156|1183$وَنَكُونَ|and we (would) have been|197|254|5365$مِنَ|of|50|79|156$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believers?"|117|117|1964$

3300.verse: فَلَمَّا|But when|82|99|141$جَآءَهُمُ|came to them|112|147|2702$ٱلْحَقُّ|the truth|80|115|268$مِنْ عِندِنَا|from Us|110|145|8247$قَالُواْ|they said,|86|121|101$لَوْلَآ|"Why not|81|98|1090$أُوتِىَ|he was given|107|114|1237$مِثْلَ|(the) like|80|94|1052$مَآ|(of) what|83|97|262$أُوتِىَ|was given|86|100|1237$مُوسَىٰٓ‌ۚ|(to) Musa?"|97|111|499$أَوَلَمْ|Did not|67|81|2346$يَكْفُرُواْ|they disbelieve|119|126|862$بِمَآ|in what|69|84|43$أُوتِىَ|was given|86|117|1237$مُوسَىٰ|(to) Musa|85|116|499$مِن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before?|92|123|250$قَالُواْ|They said,|89|120|101$سِحْرَانِ|"Two magic (works)|151|166|13473$تَظَـٰهَرَا|supporting each other."|176|186|13474$وَقَالُوٓاْ|And they said,|116|137|760$إِنَّا|"Indeed, we|99|120|120$بِكُلٍّ|in all|57|78|13475$كَـٰفِرُونَ|(are) disbelievers."|144|154|6416$

3301.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|66|765$فَأْتُواْ|"Then bring|95|128|219$بِكِتَـٰبٍ|a Book|79|112|6442$مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ|from Allah,|137|170|754$هُوَ|which|58|91|298$أَهْدَىٰ|(is) a better guide|141|158|4071$مِنْهُمَآ|than both of them|141|162|966$أَتَّبِعْهُ|that I may follow it,|152|194|13476$إِن|if|44|86|225$كُنتُمْ|you are|70|112|214$صَـٰدِقِينَ|truthful."|99|120|226$

3302.verse: فَإِن|But if|55|61|227$لَّمْ|not|42|54|63$يَسْتَجِيبُواْ|they respond|107|119|8404$لَكَ|to you,|68|80|323$فَٱعْلَمْ|then know|89|101|5030$أَنَّمَا|that only|80|92|3535$يَتَّبِعُونَ|they follow|93|105|3921$أَهْوَآءَهُمْ‌ۚ|their desires.|106|112|1116$وَمَنْ|And who|77|83|1012$أَضَلُّ|(is) more astray|126|138|7022$مِمَّنِ|than (one) who|123|135|5485$ٱتَّبَعَ|follows|65|77|3459$هَوَٮٰهُ|his own desire|114|126|7004$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|82|612$هُدًى|guidance|79|85|33$مِّنَ|from|50|69|156$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|Allah?|58|97|606$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|109|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|92|184$لَا|(does) not|90|129|30$يَهْدِى|guide|69|108|1270$ٱلْقَوْمَ|the people -|102|121|2316$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers.|128|128|377$

3296.verse: And you, [O Muhammad], were not on the western side [of the mount] when We revealed to Moses the command, and you were not among the witnesses [to that].

3297.verse: But We produced [many] generations [after Moses], and prolonged was their duration. And you were not a resident among the people of Madyan, reciting to them Our verses, but We were senders [of this message].

3298.verse: And you were not at the side of the mount when We called [Moses] but [were sent] as a mercy from your Lord to warn a people to whom no warner had come before you that they might be reminded.

3299.verse: And if not that a disaster should strike them for what their hands put forth [of sins] and they would say, "Our Lord, why did You not send us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses and been among the believers?"...

3300.verse: But when the truth came to them from Us, they said, "Why was he not given like that which was given to Moses?" Did they not disbelieve in that which was given to Moses before? They said, "[They are but] two works of magic supporting each other, and indeed we are, in both, disbelievers."

3301.verse: Say, "Then bring a scripture from Allah which is more guiding than either of them that I may follow it, if you should be truthful."

3302.verse: But if they do not respond to you - then know that they only follow their [own] desires. And who is more astray than one who follows his desire without guidance from Allah? Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
